techmeme.title: Humane tells AI Pin owners that they should "immediately" stop using the charging case, citing issues with a battery cell that "may pose a fire safety risk" (Wes Davis/The Verge)
Duolingo deletes LGBTQ+ references in Russia after being warned by the country's communications regulator that the content is classed as "extremism" (Reuters)
Nvidia hits a $3T market cap and passes Apple as the second most valuable public US company, behind Microsoft (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
The Greater Memphis Chamber says xAI plans to develop a new facility in Memphis to house a supercomputer and could receive tax breaks and other incentives (Kurt Wagner/Bloomberg)
Coinbase launches its smart wallet, which uses passkeys instead of seed phrases and works without app or extension installs, in a move to simplify onboarding (Sage D. Young/Unchained)
